dmr.command_mode.sit.text: You told your dragon to sit
dmr.command_mode.follow.text: You told your dragon to follow you
dmr.command_mode.wander.text: You told your dragon to wander
dmr.command_mode.passive.text: You told your dragon to be passive
dmr.command_mode.neutral.text: You told your dragon to be neutral
dmr.command_mode.aggressive.text: You told your dragon to be aggressive
dmr.dragon_call.on_cooldown: You can't call your dragon yet!
dmr.dragon_call.riding: You can't call your dragon while riding!
dmr.dragon_call.nospace: There isn't enough space here to call your dragon!
dmr.dragon_call.nodragon: You have no dragon to call!
dmr.dragon_call.respawn: Your dragon is dead, you can call it back in %1$s seconds!
dmr.dragon_call.unlink_first: You must unbind this from your current dragon before you can bind another!
dmr.dragon_call.no_whistle: You need a whistle to call your dragon!
dmr.dragon_summon.tooltip.2: Dead, Can be called back in %1$s seconds
dmr.commands.dragon_recall.success: The dragon has successfully been recalled
item.dmr.blank_egg.tooltip: This blank egg can be placed down anywhere and will adapt to current environment.
item.dmr.dragon_egg.deprecated.tooltip: Place down the egg to get the correct new version.
dmr.ability.quick_flight.name: Quick Flight
dmr.ability.quick_flight.description: The dragon has increased flight speed
dmr.ability.crystal_harmony.name: Crystal Harmony
dmr.ability.crystal_harmony.description: The dragon and its owner has a chance to block incoming damage
dmr.ability.gem_guard.name: Gem Guard
dmr.ability.gem_guard.description: The dragon and its owner has a chance to deflect incoming projectiles
dmr.ability.ender_cloak.name: Ender Cloak
dmr.ability.ender_cloak.description: When near the dragon you will not anger endermen
dmr.ability.void_walker.name: Void Walker
dmr.ability.void_walker.description: When near the dragon you will not be hurt by fall damage
dmr.ability.ember_aura.name: Ember Aura
dmr.ability.ember_aura.description: Any hostiles near the dragon are set on fire
dmr.ability.fire_proof.name: Fire Proof
dmr.ability.fire_proof.description: When near the dragon you are immune to fire damage
dmr.ability.hot_feet.name: Hot Feet
dmr.ability.hot_feet.description: The dragon will light the ground on fire when walking
dmr.ability.camouflage.name: Camouflage
dmr.ability.camouflage.description: Hostiles will have a shorter range for detecting the dragon and its nearby owner
dmr.ability.nature_blessing.name: Nature's Blessing
dmr.ability.nature_blessing.description: When the dragon is near flowers and plants, it will grant itself and its owner regeneration
dmr.ability.ethereal_harmony.name: Ethereal Harmony
dmr.ability.ethereal_harmony.description: The dragon and its rider will not be targeted by undead
dmr.ability.frost_aura.name: Frost Aura
dmr.ability.frost_aura.description: Any hostiles near the dragon are given slowness
dmr.ability.frost_walker.name: Frost Walker
dmr.ability.frost_walker.description: The dragon will freeze water when walking
dmr.ability.floral_trail.name: Floral Trail
dmr.ability.floral_trail.description: The dragon will leave a trail of plants and flowers when walking
dmr.ability.infernal_pact.name: Infernal Pact
dmr.ability.infernal_pact.description: The dragon and its owner will not be targeted by hostiles in the nether
dmr.ability.echo_sense.name: Echo Sense
dmr.ability.echo_sense.description: When near the dragon you will be able to see hostiles through walls
dmr.ability.aquatic_grace.name: Aquatic Grace
dmr.ability.aquatic_grace.description: When riding the dragon in water, you will be given night vision
dmr.ability.swift_swim.name: Swift Swim
dmr.ability.swift_swim.description: The dragon and its owner will be given Dolphin's Grace
dmr.advancements.root.title: Dragon Mounts Remaster
dmr.advancements.find_egg.title: Find a Weird-Looking Egg
dmr.advancements.find_egg.description: Dragon eggs can be found in various structures around the world.
dmr.advancements.dragon_egg.title: Find a %1$s!
dmr.advancements.dragon_egg.description: You have successfully located a %1$s egg. Now, hatch it!
dmr.advancements.hatch_egg.title: Hatch a %1$s!
dmr.advancements.hatch_egg.description: Hatch the %1$s egg by placing it down, right-clicking it, and waiting for it to hatch!
dmr.advancements.tame_dragon.title: Tame a %1$s!
dmr.advancements.tame_dragon.description: You have successfully tamed a %1$s. Now, ride it!
dmr.advancements.tame_dragon_1.title: Why Fish?
dmr.advancements.tame_dragon_1.descripti: Tame your first dragon by feeding it fish!
dmr.advancements.hatch_egg_1.title: That's a Funny-Looking Dog
dmr.advancements.hatch_egg_1.description: Hatch your first dragon—it's definitely not a dog.
dmr.advancements.hatch_egg_5.title: I'm Getting Used to It Now!
dmr.advancements.hatch_egg_5.description: Hatch 5 dragons. Your home is sure to be lively!
dmr.advancements.hatch_egg_10.title: Crazy 'Cat' Lady
dmr.advancements.hatch_egg_10.descriptio: Hatch 10 dragons. You're becoming the dragon equivalent of a crazy cat person.
dmr.advancements.hatch_egg_100.title: Dragon Conservationist
dmr.advancements.hatch_egg_100.descripti: Hatch 100 dragons. Do you even know which one is which?
dmr.advancements.defeat_with_dragon.desc: Defeat a creature using your dragon's attack.
dmr.advancements.find_hybrid_egg.title: Mix and Match Eggs
dmr.advancements.find_hybrid_egg.descrip: Obtain a hybrid egg by breeding two different dragons.
dmr.advancements.hatch_hybrid.title: Hybridization
dmr.advancements.hatch_hybrid.descriptio: Hatch a hybrid egg by placing it down, right-clicking it, and waiting for it to hatch!
dmr.configuration.title: Dragon Mounts Remastered Configuration
dmr.config.client.alternate_attack_key.t: Should dragon attacks require holding down the dragon attack key?
dmr.config.client.alternate_dismount.too: Should dismounting the dragon require double pressing the dismount button? Disabling this will not allow using sneak or the dismount button to descend.
dmr.config.client.camera_flight.tooltip: Should the dragon be controlled by the camera during flight?
dmr.config.client.colored_whistle_menu.t: Should the dragon whistle command menu display colors matching the whistle's color?
dmr.config.client.render_hatching_egg.to: Should the dragon egg render the hatching animation?
dmr.config.client.riding_camera_offset.t: The zoom offset for the riding camera. Higher values will zoom the camera out further.
dmr.config.server.allow_egg_override.too:
Allow the vanilla ender egg to be interacted with? (Hatchable)
Useful to help with mod compatibility
dmr.config.server.allow_respawn.tooltip: Allow dragons to respawn after being killed.
dmr.config.server.base_speed.tooltip: Base movement speed for all dragons.
dmr.config.server.dragon_egg_spawn_chanc: Multiplier for dragon egg spawn chances in loot sources. 0 disables spawning, 1 is default rate, 2 doubles the chance.
dmr.config.server.dragon_history_size.to: The maximum number of dragons to keep track of in the dragon history. This allows recalling missing dragons through commands. Larger values may increase world save size.
dmr.config.server.enable_blank_egg.toolt: Enable blank dragon eggs which changes based on the environment.
dmr.config.server.enable_natural_dragon_: Enable or disable natural dragon spawns.
dmr.config.server.enable_random_stats.to: Whether to enable random stats for dragons.
dmr.config.server.growth_time.tooltip: Time in seconds for a dragon to grow.
dmr.config.server.habitat_offspring.tool: Offspring from breeding can turn into dragon type matching current environment.
dmr.config.server.hatch_time.tooltip: Time in seconds for a dragon egg to hatch.
dmr.config.server.health_regen.tooltip: Passive health regen value for dragons.
dmr.config.server.lower_damage.tooltip: The minimum damage penalty for dragons with random stats.
dmr.config.server.lower_max_health.toolt: The minimum health penalty for dragons with random stats.
dmr.config.server.lower_speed.tooltip: The minimum speed penalty for dragons with random stats.
dmr.config.server.max_follow_distance.to: Maximum distance before a dragon will start following its owner.
dmr.config.server.min_follow_distance.to: Minimum distance a dragon will maintain when following its owner.
dmr.config.server.replenish_eggs.tooltip:
Should Ender Dragon Eggs replenish on the exit portal after a respawned dragon is defeated?
Useful for multiplayer scenarios.
dmr.config.server.respawn_time.tooltip: Time in seconds for a dragon to respawn after being killed.
dmr.config.server.upper_damage.tooltip: The maximum damage bonus for dragons with random stats.
dmr.config.server.upper_max_health.toolt: The maximum health bonus for dragons with random stats.
dmr.config.server.upper_speed.tooltip: The maximum speed bonus for dragons with random stats.
dmr.config.server.whistle_check_space.to: Check if there is enough space to call the dragon before calling it.
dmr.config.server.whistle_cooldown.toolt: The cooldown for using the whistle ability.
